I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. effort to speed up the decision-making within the company. Eric Schmidt has also drafted a plan to sell some of the stock he holds in the company. The news surfaced in a regulatory filing last week. The pre-arranged trading plan was adopted in order to allow Eric Schmidt to sell a portion of his Google stock as part of his long-term strategy for individual asset diversification and liquidity, the filing said. Eric Schmidt holds 9.2 million shares of Google stock and has 9.6% of the company's voting power according to Reuters. He plans to sell 534,000 shares of Class A common stock--

Even as we make America the best place on Earth to do business, businesses also have a responsibility to America,'' he told the businessmen in the Chamber. Echoing John Kennedy 's inaugural speech, he said, I'm hoping that all of you are thinking what you can do for America. Ask yourselves what you can do to hire more American workers, what you can do to support the American economy and invest in this nation. Just how readily U.S. business leaders will take up Barack Obama 's challenge is unclear.
